website_summaries.verdict: This natural deodorant is made from a simple formula containing seaweed extract, mineral salt, and pure essential oils.
pros: Has a lovely rose scent and keeps you smelling fresh and clean all day long
cons: Contains a small percentage of alcohol, which can cause stinging sensation for people with allergies or sensitivities

customer_reviews.title: Works well but dries up after a month and turns into a solid mass🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to use this product regularly for about a month before it “dried up”? It was doing a good job at fighting odor but it just dried up and stops coming out and becomes a solid mass I shake it and there’s still definitely stuff in there. It advertises that it can last up to 3 months it didn’t make it close to that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Doughnuts

customer_reviews.title: BETRAYAL!!! UNBEARABLY ITCHY PITS! MISLEADING PURITY CLAIMS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first deodorants that pop up when you type in organic deodorant. It had tons of great reviews so I bought it without giving the ingredients list more than a once over (lazy, I know). Turns out, it contains some kind of aluminum salt that is highly absorbable through the skin. Most people who are searching out healthier deodorant options know that aluminum is one of the worst ingredients. This product is a counterfeit organic masquerade product that contains the same unhealthy crap that regular deodorants have. I'm very disappointed and will be more vigilant about reading and analyzing ingredients lists in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Piratesweetie

customer_reviews.title: He asked if I would like to try another scent and when I couldn't decide ...

I wrote back that I was unable to use the product but one time because the Original Essence fragrance was too strong for me. He asked if I would like to try another scent and when I couldn't decide on Aloe or Rose he offered to send both without charge. I was so impressed with this gesture. I just received the items and like both scents, the Aloe being the softer of the two.This deodorant rolls on easily and is not sticky. Excellent customer service!

customer_reviews.title: Not Aluminum Free
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I’d like to preface that this is my first Amazon review. Ever. I felt compelled to write this because I was slightly misled upon purchasing. This is NOT aluminum free deodorant. Although the product doesn’t claim to be free of aluminum, it does say it is “aluminum chlorohydrate” free. If you don’t do your research, and get suckered into buying this based on the great reviews like me, you’ll likely be disappointed. Apparently “potassium alum” is a nice way of hiding that pesky ingredient. That said, I love the smell and the feel of the deodorant. I wish I could love this and wear it daily, but I am looking for a strict “aluminum free” deodorant. Bummed!

Bali Secrets keeps you feeling fresh and protected all day long. Naturally.

Ingredient lists are best kept short.

At Bali Secrets we prefer to keep things simple and focus on quality. We use only a handful of natural ingredients. Nothing less. Nothing more.

 * Seaweed Extract (Gracilaria verrucosa)
 * Distilled Water (Aqua)
 * Natural Mineral Salt (Potassium alum)
 * Aloe Vera Gel (Aloe barbadensis)
 * Alcohol (Ethanol)
 * Coconut Oil (Cocos nucifera)
 * Rose Oil (Rosa Rubiginosa)



Unlike regular deodorants and antiperspirants, everything is natural. All of our natural ingredients are rated highly by the independent cosmetic database EWG.org.

Natural mineral salt (Potassium alum) is a naturally occurring stone with a long history of usage. For thousands of years, it has been used by Ayurveda, Traditional Chinese Medicine and other holistic systems. The combination of seaweed extract with mineral salt in this formula keeps you fresh by naturally reducing the conditions responsible for unwanted body odor.

We're so sure you are going to love our Natural Deodorant that we offer a 30 day money-back guarantee. You have our word.
